title: Snapchat penetration rate in the Netherlands 2017 - 2018 , by age group
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 3 lines namely 2016, 2017, and 2018. The y axis represents Share of respondants and the x axis represents Year.
Overall 2016, 2017, and 2018 are rapidly decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. 2018, 2. 2017, and lastly, 3. 2016.
Throughout the period, 2018 generally had the highest Share of respondants relative to others with an average of 22.6, and it reached its maximum at 15-19_years with a value of 72.0.
After 2018, 2017 overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 19.4, peaking at 15-19_years.
2016 mostly had the least Share of respondants with a mean value of 13.8, which peaked at 15-19_years with a value of 56.0.
